name: Alice In Wonderland: The Tree of Life
name_original: Alice In Wonderland: The Tree of Life
description:
Welcome to Wonderland, fellows! This is the 1st Alice in Wonderland game by Majid Roth Media, presenting a platformer adventure with Alice and her friends: Charlie (bunny), Dr. Frostpole (penguin), Eric (dwarf), Felicity (fairy) and Cashcat (cat).Play the story mode or explore the Infinite mode where you can collect silk (game currency) that you can use to unlock new background music, dresses and skills.

WASD control and alternatively with arrow keys, J for jumping, K for skills; there is an ingame tutorial

Feel free to write a comment about which unlockable is the best.

CC credits:

Charlie 3D model is based on the following 3D template: "Cartoon easter bunny" (Sketchfab model) by assetfactory https://skfb.ly/o9VFD is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
